Title: Beware Greeks Bearing Gifts
Plot: Helen of Troy summons Xena and asks her to help end the war between the Greeks and the Trojans, that began over her.
Director: T.J. Scott, Roy Thomas, Janis Hendler
GuestStars: Scott Garrison, Galyn Gorg, Warren Carl, Cameron Rhodes, Ken Blackburn, Adrian Keeling, Aidan MacBride Stewart, John Manning, Mathews Jeffs, Peter Ford, Geoffrey Knight
